1011011111110101 1110010101001001 1 -> sum: 1001110100111111, cout: 1
0011111101001110 1101110110010110 0 -> sum: 0001110011100100, cout: 1
1001001101000100 1000011000110100 0 -> sum: 0001100101111000, cout: 1
0011110001111100 0100000101011010 0 -> sum: 0111110111010110, cout: 0
1100001011011000 0011000101010111 1 -> sum: 1111010000110000, cout: 0
1011100100001100 0100110100110000 0 -> sum: 0000011000111100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
